name: Clefable
flavorText:
A timid fairy
POKéMON that is
rarely seen. It will run and hide
the moment it
senses people.

previous.name: Clefairy
previous.flavorText:
Its magical and
cute appeal has
many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.

next.name: Vulpix
next.flavorText:
At the time of
birth, it has
just one tail. The tail splits
from its tip as
it grows older.

pokemon.name: Cleffa
pokemon.flavorText:
Because of its
unusual, star-like
silhouette, people believe that it
came here on
a meteor.

many admirers. It is rare and
found only in
certain areas.
